adDetails: Multiple insurance protections: $2,000,000 General Liability Insurance, $750,000 Auto Insurance, $1,000,000 Workers' Comp Insurance, and $20,000 cargo insurance. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Professional Moving Company (Licensed and Insured) We charge : $65-per hour for 2 professional movers and truck. $85-per hour for 3 professional movers and truck. $115-per hour for 4 professional movers and truck. Here is what we offer: -Packing -House to house move -House to storage move -Storage to house move -Commercial/office moves -Furniture delivery from store to your house -Unpacking -Furniture Dis-assembly/-Re-assembly and more We provide wardrobe boxes, blankets, shrink wrap, mattress covers to ensure that your items do not get damaged- FOR FREE PLEASE CALL show contact info
